input_args.passage: 'Young-Earth Creationist View Summarized And Defended | Young-earth creationists believe that the creation days of Genesis 1 were six literal (24-hour) days, which occurred 6,000–12,000 years ago.1 ...'
input_args.claim: 'They hold that the creation days mentioned in Genesis 1 of the Bible were six literal days, and this creation happened 6,000 to 12,000 years ago.'
